game.name: Elemental Brawl
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Elemental Brawl is a multiplayer party game for everyone who likes to beat up their friends (in a good way!) with the power of the elements! Compete across interactive arenas, mix and match elements for new and exciting attacks, and use them to bring even more excitement into other players' lives!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Elemental Brawl is a multiplayer party game for everyone who likes to beat up their friends (in a good way!) with the power of the elements! Compete across interactive arenas, mix and match elements for new and exciting attacks, and use them to bring even more excitement into other players' lives!
